## Collaborative Features

**Phase:** Phase 3 - Advanced Features
**Timeline:** 8-10 weeks
**Section:** 3.1

### Goal
Add social features, advanced analytics, and AI improvements

### Impact
Transforms from single-user to social platform

### Effort Estimate
3 weeks

### Priority
P2

- [ ] Create playlist commenting system
